revtext:
Thanks very much for your kind words and appreciation. 
Our staff are trained to make a difference in people\'s lives with our exclusive hair pieces.
revreply:
Thank you so much Rosy for your great customer service and for your patience! 
I\'m truly satisfied with your consultation. 
Definitely I will visit your Store again,  
I loved that wig which you have suggested me ! 
Thank u so much.
